page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: THE AREA THIS BLOCK IS OF AN UNDULATING,AGRICULTURAL CHARACTER WITH A NUMBER OF STREAM VALLEYS GOING DOWN TO THE R.STOUR.THE LAND IS NOT ONLY HILLLY BUT EXTREMELY MIXED GOING FROM ALMOST PURE SAND TO HEAVY CLAY IN THE SAME FIELD, A LEGACY OF THE EDGE OF THE ICE AGE GLACIATION.MOST OF THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE IN THIS BLOCK DO NOT WORK IN IT.THEY ARE GLAD TO COMMUTE OR RETIRE TO IT.VERY LITTLE NEW HOUSING HAS BEEN ALLOWED BY THE PLANNERS.THE PARISHES OF BULMER,MIDDLETON,LITTLE & GREAT HENNY ARE MENTIONED SEPARATELY IN THE TEXT.
